General.Name: T T Limited
General.Description: T.T. Limited manufactures and sells textile products in India. The company's products portfolio includes raw cotton; cotton yarn for knitting and weaving; various knitted fabrics; knitted innerwear; garments for men, ladies, and kids; casual wear and home textiles; food products; and PPE kits. It also engages in the spinning, dyeing, and printing of textiles. In addition, the company provides agro commodities, such as poultry and cattle feed, including soybean meal, cotton seed meal, de oiled rice bran, groundnut meal, castor meal, safflower meal, rapeseed meal, and barley; oil seeds consists of groundnut kernels, natural white and black sesame seeds, hulled sesame seeds, and niger seeds; spices comprising cumin, fennel, ajwain, dill, fenugreek, and coriander seeds, as well as turmeric fingers; grains, including yellow corn/maize, millets, and sorghum; and castor oil and derivatives, such as castor oil and castor seed extraction meal. It is involved in exporting activities. T.T. Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: 879, Master Prithvi Nath Marg, New Delhi, India, 110005
